LanguageData.DDJY_BondageBed.label: bondageBed
LanguageData.DDJY_BondageBed.description: Bound prisoners on it to make sure that they can't make trouble for you.
LanguageData.DDJY_BarCage.label: Bar Cage
LanguageData.DDJY_BarCage.description: A human-sized metal bar cage for holding prisoners. It's low on the ground and uncomfortable.
LanguageData.DDJY_BindingCross.label: Binding Cross
LanguageData.DDJY_BindingCross.description: A cross shaped framework used to bound prisoners. Previously labeled "True Cross".
LanguageData.DDJY_SaltireCross.label: Saltire Cross
LanguageData.DDJY_SaltireCross.description: An X-shaped framework used to bound prisoners in spreadeagle position, commonly known as X-cross, X-frame, or saltire cross. Previously labeled "Torture Cross".
LanguageData.DDJY_RoundCage.label: Round Cage
LanguageData.DDJY_RoundCage.description: A gibbet cage for living prisoners.
LanguageData.DDJY_PrisonerPole.label: Prisoner Pole
LanguageData.DDJY_PrisonerPole.description: A simple, tall pole used to bound prisoners.
LanguageData.DDJY_Pillory.label: Pillory
LanguageData.DDJY_Pillory.description: A framework used to bound prisoners, with 3 holes for securing their head and hands.
